>Construction of pLYC21
acquire oligo ZH30			
acquire oligo ZH31
acquire oligo ZH32
acquire oligo ZH33
acquire oligo G00101
acquire oligo ZH25
acquire plasmid pLYC18
acquire plasmid TPU4HIGH
PCR ZH30,ZH31 on pLYC18	(4699 bp, pcrA)
PCR ZH32,ZH33 on pLYC18	(4753 bp, pcrB)
PCR G00101,ZH25 on TPU4HIGH (226 bp, pcrC)
Assemble pcrA,pcrB,pcrC	(BsaI, pLYC21)
Transform pLYC21	(Mach1, Amp)
